Activity: Log in to the OA system and check emails. Respond to any urgent requests regarding the UI designs.
Gather all finalized mockups (main menu, settings, inventory, HUD) created throughout the week.
Start prototyping the UI interactions in Figma, linking the mockups together to create a basic interactive flow.
Focus on prototyping the main menu navigation, settings adjustments, inventory management, and HUD feedback mechanisms.
Test the UI prototype and ask @Qtest-1 (QA Tester) to test the prototype, identifying any usability issues or areas for improvement. @Qtest-1 UI Prototype Testing Request.
Address the usability issues and feedback received from testing, refining the UI prototype accordingly.
Create a presentation showcasing the UI designs and prototype to the wider team, including @Ldes-1 (Lead Game Designer), @Cdev-1 (Client Developer), and @Prod-1 (Producer).
Gather final feedback from the team on the UI designs and prototype. Discuss next steps and future iterations.
Update the UI/UX design documentation with the final designs and prototype. Prepare a summary of the week's work and outstanding tasks.
